revised_title: Backlund Transformations for Nonlinear Parabolic Equations: General Results
tldr: This article explores the most general form of Backlund transformations for nonlinear parabolic equations and determines the existence of these transformations for a given class of equations. The authors use a method closely related to Clairin's method to analyze the integrability of these equations and provide a comprehensive understanding of the connections between Backlund transformations and inverse scattering methods of solution.
